name: Pöng
description:
Pöng is fantastic and very fun Arcade Game developed specifically for the Apple Watch. If you liked Pong in your childhood, then you willl love Pöng!

To play this game you will need a Apple Watch.
To hear game sound, a paired and activated iPhone in range of the Watch is necessary.

See the Preview - Videos for a quick impression, if they don't work or if you have an iPhone 4 or iPad please use the following Link for a Video-Impression: http://youtu.be/Qt6q__6H14A
